DOC.brief_summary: The objective of this study is to evaluate the effect of the International Child Development Program (ICDP). Research questions to be answered: 1. Does the ICDP affect children's psychosocial functioning compared to treatment as usual? 2. Does the ICDP change parent-child interaction?
DOC.brief_title: Effectiveness Study of the International Child Development Program
DOC.criteria: SDQ >/= 9, subjective treatment need Already in treatment
